extraDescription: Employment and Social Development Canada requires one system Administrator Level 2 to help plan and organize work activities related to the rollout of GCNet within Employment and Social Development Canada
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100004311 dated June 23, 2015. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
